remarks: The value of the zero object function, i.e. the set of all zero objects of a category.  (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2020.)
statement:
initoval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
initoval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
initoval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
zerooval $p |- ( ph -> ( ZeroO ` C ) = ( ( InitO ` C ) i^i ( TermO ` C ) ) ) $.
